title: Before 9:30
creator_credit: Brigid Kitchin and Macquarie University. Dept. of Media and Communication Studies
brief_description: Inspired by a real life incident, this short film is a timely and poignant reminder about the anguish experienced by young children at primary school. Intended as a discussion piece for counsellors, teachers and family care workers. Cast includes Evan Sheaves, Jessica Rees and Nathy Gaffney.
